sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_EM_EXPERT_TYPE_JOIN( EM_EXPERT_CODE, EM_TYPE_CODE ) values ( #emExpertCode:VARCHAR#, #emTypeCode:VARCHAR# )

insert into ZC_EM_B_EXPERT( EM_EXPERT_CODE, EM_EXPERT_NAME, EM_EXPERT_NAMESPELL, EM_EXPERT_SEX, EM_BIRTHDAY, EM_EXPERT_ZP, EM_EXPERT_ZP_BLOBID, EM_PO_TYPE, EM_ID_TYPE, EM_ID_NO, EM_DIPLOMA, EM_DEGREE, EM_UNIVERSITY, EM_GRADUATION_TIME, EM_MAJOR, EM_WORK_STARTTIME, EM_MAJOR_STARTIME, EM_PROVINCE, EM_CITY, EM_COUNTY, EM_UNIT_TYPE, EM_UNIT_NAME, EM_EXPERT_PROTITLE, EM_PRINCIPALSHIP, EM_PROTITLE_TIME, EM_ZHIY_ZGMC, EM_ZHIY_ZGZSH, EM_HOME_ADDR, EM_HOME_PHONE, EM_MOBILE, EM_UNIT_PHONE, EM_EMAIL, EM_UNIT_ADDR, EM_UNIT_POSTCODE, EM_HOME_POSTCODE, EM_MAJOR_LB, EM_GONGZ_JINGL, EM_CHENGGUO, EM_XIEHUI, EM_GUWEN, EM_PINGB_JINGY, EM_BEIZHU ) values( #em_expert_code# ,#em_expert_name# ,#em_expert_namespell# ,#em_expert_sex# ,#em_birthday# ,#em_expert_zp# ,#em_expert_zp_blobid# ,#em_po_type# ,#em_id_type# ,#em_id_no# ,#em_diploma# ,#em_degree# ,#em_university# ,#em_graduation_time# ,#em_major# ,#em_work_starttime# ,#em_major_startime# ,#em_province# ,#em_city# ,#em_county# ,#em_unit_type# ,#em_unit_name# ,#em_expert_protitle# ,#em_principalship# ,#em_protitle_time# ,#em_zhiy_zgmc# ,#em_zhiy_zgzsh# ,#em_home_addr# ,#em_home_phone# ,#em_mobile# ,#em_unit_phone# ,#em_email# ,#em_unit_addr# ,#em_unit_postcode# ,#em_home_postcode# ,#em_major_lb# ,#em_gongz_jingl# ,#em_chengguo# ,#em_xiehui# ,#em_guwen# ,#em_pingb_jingy# ,#em_beizhu# )

insert into ZC_EM_B_EXPERT( EM_EXPERT_CODE, EM_EXPERT_NAME, EM_EXPERT_NAMESPELL, EM_EXPERT_SEX, EM_BIRTHDAY, EM_EXPERT_ZP, EM_EXPERT_ZP_BLOBID, EM_PO_TYPE, EM_ID_TYPE, EM_ID_NO, EM_DIPLOMA, EM_DEGREE, EM_UNIVERSITY, EM_GRADUATION_TIME, EM_MAJOR, EM_WORK_STARTTIME, EM_MAJOR_STARTIME, EM_PROVINCE, EM_CITY, EM_COUNTY, EM_UNIT_TYPE, EM_UNIT_NAME, EM_EXPERT_PROTITLE, EM_PRINCIPALSHIP, EM_PROTITLE_TIME, EM_ZHIY_ZGMC, EM_ZHIY_ZGZSH, EM_HOME_ADDR, EM_HOME_PHONE, EM_MOBILE, EM_UNIT_PHONE, EM_EMAIL, EM_UNIT_ADDR, EM_UNIT_POSTCODE, EM_HOME_POSTCODE, EM_MAJOR_LB, EM_GONGZ_JINGL, EM_CHENGGUO, EM_XIEHUI, EM_GUWEN, EM_PINGB_JINGY, EM_BEIZHU, EM_EXP_STATUS, EM_FUJIAN1_BLOBID, EM_FUJIAN2_BLOBID ) values( #emExpertCode# ,#emExpertName# ,#emExpertNameSpell# ,#emExpertSex# ,#emBirthday# ,#emExpertZp# ,#emExpertZpBlobID# ,#emPoType# ,#emIdType# ,#emIdNo# ,#emDiploma# ,#emDegree# ,#emUniversity# ,#emGraduationTime# ,#emMajor# ,#emWorkStartTime# ,#emMajorStartTime# ,#emProvince# ,#emCity# ,#emCounty# ,#emUnitType# ,#emUnitName# ,#emExpertProtitle# ,#emPrincipalship# ,#emProtitleTime# ,#emZhiyZgmc# ,#emZhiyZgzsh# ,#emHomeAddr# ,#emHomePhone# ,#emMobile# ,#emUnitPhone# ,#emEmail# ,#emUnitAddr# ,#emUnitPostcode# ,#emHomePostcode# ,#emMajorLb# ,#emGongzJingl# ,#emChengGuo# ,#emXieHui# ,#emGuWen# ,#emPingbJingy# ,#emBeiZhu# ,#emExpStatus# ,#emFuJian1BlobID# ,#emFuJian2BlobID# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ZC_EM_B_EXPERT E WHERE E.Em_Expert_Namespell=#userId#
select USER_ID from as_user where USER_ID = #userCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: update ZC_EM_B_EXPERT set EM_EXPERT_NAMESPELL= #em_expert_namespell:VARCHAR# where EM_EXPERT_CODE= #em_expert_code#
sqlMap.select: ZC_EM_B_EXPERT.EM_EXP_STATUS='0' ZC_EM_B_EXPERT.EM_EXP_STATUS='enable' ZC_EM_B_EXPERT.EM_EXP_STATUS='suspended' ZC_EM_B_EXPERT.EM_EXP_STATUS='cancel' 1=1 ORDER BY ZC_EM_B_EXPERT.EM_EXPERT_CODE
select e.* from zc_em_b_expert e, zc_em_expert_type_join j where e.em_expert_code = j.em_expert_code and j.em_type_code like #value#||'%' and e.em_exp_status='enable'
sqlMap.update: update ZC_EM_B_EXPERT set EM_EXPERT_NAME = #emExpertName# , EM_EXPERT_NAMESPELL = #emExpertNameSpell# , EM_EXPERT_SEX = #emExpertSex# , EM_BIRTHDAY = #emBirthday# , EM_EXPERT_ZP = #emExpertZp# , EM_EXPERT_ZP_BLOBID = #emExpertZpBlobID# , EM_PO_TYPE = #emPoType# , EM_ID_TYPE = #emIdType# , EM_ID_NO = #emIdNo# , EM_DIPLOMA = #emDiploma# , EM_DEGREE = #emDegree# , EM_UNIVERSITY = #emUniversity# , EM_GRADUATION_TIME = #emGraduationTime# , EM_MAJOR = #emMajor# , EM_WORK_STARTTIME = #emWorkStartTime# , EM_MAJOR_STARTIME = #emMajorStartTime# , EM_PROVINCE = #emProvince# , EM_CITY = #emCity# , EM_COUNTY = #emCounty#, EM_UNIT_TYPE = #emUnitType#, EM_UNIT_NAME = #emUnitName# , EM_EXPERT_PROTITLE = #emExpertProtitle# , EM_PRINCIPALSHIP = #emPrincipalship#, EM_PROTITLE_TIME = #emProtitleTime# , EM_ZHIY_ZGMC = #emZhiyZgmc# , EM_ZHIY_ZGZSH = #emZhiyZgzsh# , EM_HOME_ADDR = #emHomeAddr# , EM_HOME_PHONE = #emHomePhone# , EM_MOBILE = #emMobile# , EM_UNIT_PHONE = #emUnitPhone#, EM_EMAIL = #emEmail# , EM_UNIT_ADDR = #emUnitAddr# , EM_UNIT_POSTCODE = #emUnitPostcode# , EM_HOME_POSTCODE = #emHomePostcode# , EM_MAJOR_LB = #emMajorLb# , EM_GONGZ_JINGL = #emGongzJingl# , EM_CHENGGUO = #emChengGuo# , EM_XIEHUI = #emXieHui# , EM_GUWEN = #emGuWen# , EM_PINGB_JINGY = #emPingbJingy#, EM_BEIZHU = #emBeiZhu# , EM_EXP_STATUS = #emExpStatus#, EM_FUJIAN1_BLOBID = #emFuJian1BlobID#, EM_FUJIAN2_BLOBID = #emFuJian2BlobID# where EM_EXPERT_CODE = #emExpertCode#
